cast.name: 罗伯特·帕丁森 Robert Pattinson
詹妮弗·洛佩兹 Jennifer Lopez

this_title: Actors on Actors: Robert Pattinson & Jennifer Lopez
trans_title: 演员对谈：罗伯特·帕丁森&詹妮弗·洛佩兹
introduction: In their Actors on Actors conversation, Robert Pattinson talked about why he wanted to play Batman and Jennifer Lopez discussed her upcoming Super Bowl performance.In “Hustlers,” Jennifer Lopez plays Ramona, the ringleader of a gang formed in a New York strip club. She’s equal parts private dancer and hardened criminal, a combination that Oscar voters might find as irresistible as general audiences have. One of the many admirers of “Hustlers” is Robert Pattinson — himself no stranger to shadowy settings. In his latest film, “The Lighthouse,” Pattinson plays a keeper of a desolate watchtower who is slowly losing his mind.Read the full story:https://variety.com/2019/film/actors/jennifer-lopez-robert-pattinson-batman-hustlers-the-lighthouse-1203402753/

foreign_title: Actors on Actors: Robert Pattinson & Jennifer Lopez
